comment: An activist at the anti-war protest in Los Angeles asks the crowd if they think the Soleimani strike Trump authorized was a war crime . The crowd cheers . He then asks if Trump should be impeached , removed from office , and jailed for the strike . The crowd cheers again . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt An activist at the anti-war protest in Los Angeles asks the crowd if they think the Soleimani strike Trump authorized was a war crime . The crowd cheers . He then asks if Trump should be impeached , removed from office , and jailed for the strike . The crowd cheers again . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / ask-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / activist)
            :ARG1 (t / think-01
                  :ARG0 (c / crowd)
                  :ARG1 (c2 / crime-02
                        :ARG1 (s / strike-01
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Soleimani"))
                              :ARG1-of (a3 / authorize-01
                                    :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Trump"))))
                        :mod (w / war)))
            :ARG2 c)
      :snt2 (c3 / cheer-02
            :ARG0 (c4 / crowd))
      :snt3 (a4 / ask-01
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (ii / impeach-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Trump")))
                        :op2 (r2 / remove-01
                              :ARG1 p3
                              :ARG2 (o / office))
                        :op3 (j / jail-01
                              :ARG1 p3
                              :ARG3 s)))
            :time (t2 / then))
      :snt4 (c5 / cheer-02
            :ARG0 (c6 / crowd)
            :mod (a6 / again)))
